channel.title: A New Private Server [Coders appreciated]!
channel.description:
[b]Hi everyone[/b],
I'm [i]Dylan[/i], I am interested in making a private server that's not like "Oh my server has the newest KBD Minigame and I copied it from Moparscape.org/smf - OJH btW it's 100 percy coded by em!1". I would like to make a server that is well based, actually has "good" features. I need people to design new clients that will make the server good.
I need other coders, as myself. I need people who know what they're doing. Not complete idiots who have an IQ of a chipmunk. Not the people who say this, "Uhmmmm, I ould liek a jbo plz...!1". People who know what they're doing. Not people who don't know what they're doing.
I figured if the server would be able to be popular to the public it would need the following.
[ul][li]A well based source.[/li] [li]A good staff team. (Moderators, Admins, Coders, Desginers, Client-Designers, Webpage Developers, etc.)[/li] [li]A website to go along with the server and the client to be hosted on.[/li] [li]Possibly a MySQL Database.[/li] [li]Good hosting (Most likely a dedicated server.)[/li] [li]Most of course it wouldn't have to be like you steal from a stall and get 1 million, billion coins. It would be more realistic.[/li][/ul]
I need a big group of coders, I will be listing them in a notepad, and I will make some SMF forums for now, then eventually upgrade them, and we will gradually work up.
If you're interested please do not spam the thread and simply follow the selected form.
[code]Your Name: (Real Name please). Your E-Mail Address: (You can PM me this one if you'd like). Position: (Do you have some proof that you can really do this?) Other: MSN (If you have it.)[/code]
Positions available:
[ul][li]Coders (3)[/li] [li]Administrators (2)[/li] [li]SQL Coder (1)[/li] [li]Server Player Moderator (3)[/li] [li]Web Designers (2)[/li] [li]FTP Managers[/li] [li]Client Coders (3)[/li][/ul]
If you'd like a position, do not spam the thread, use good grammer and act natural. We are currently not accepting the mentally challenged. :P
Thanks for your time, hope you join the new team.
[i]-Dylan[/i]
Note: You'll notice I haven't even gotten a name for the server, this can be decided when we get more staff members!
Thanks!
